com.example.geocomment

Class OptionActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.geocomment.OptionActivity

  • public class OptionActivity
extends Activity
    Option Activity method opens up the options menu in the application. It gets the username and stores that username on your phone so the user does not have to enter a username everytime said user wants to makes either a top level comment or a reply comment.
    Author:
    CMPUT 301 Team 04
